name: src/demo-manager-events.js
change
description:
A demo manager change event.

This event is dispatched by {@link DemoManager} when the user switches to
another demo.

name: load
description:
A demo manager load event.

This event is dispatched by {@link DemoManager} when a demo has finished
loading and is about to start rendering.

name: src/Demo.js
ready
description:
Indicates whether this demo is ready for rendering.

The {@link DemoManager} updates this flag automatically.

name: load
description:
Loads this demo.

Override this method to load assets.

return.description: A promise that will be fulfilled as soon as all assets have been loaded.

name: initialize
description:
Initializes this demo.

This method will be called after reset.

name: render
description:
Renders this demo.

Override this method to update and render the demo manually.

params.name: delta
params.description: The time since the last frame in seconds.

name: registerOptions
description:
Registers configuration options.

This method will be called once after initialize and then every time a new
demo is added.

name: src/DemoManager.js
menu
description: A menu for custom demo options.

name: demo
description: The id of the current demo.

name: startDemo
description:
Activates the given demo if it's still selected.

While the demo was loading, another demo may have been selected.

params.name: updateStyle
params.description: Determines whether the style of the canvas should be updated.

name: src/DemoManagerEvent.js
constructor
description: Constructs a new demo manager event.

name: src/index.js
./README.md

content:
{
	"name": "three-demo",
	"version": "3.15.0",
	"description": "A demo scaffold for three.js.",
	"homepage": "https://github.com/vanruesc/three-demo",
	"main": "build/three-demo.js",
	"module": "build/three-demo.esm.js",
	"sideEffects": false,
	"license": "Zlib",
	"keywords": [
		"demo",
		"scaffold",
		"three",
		"3d"
	],
	"author": {
		"name": "Raoul van Rschen",
		"email": "vanruesc@outlook.de"
	},
	"repository": {
		"type": "git",
		"url": "https://github.com/vanruesc/three-demo.git"
	},
	"bugs": {
		"url": "https://github.com/vanruesc/three-demo/issues"
	},
	"files": [
		"src",
		"build"
	],
	"scripts": {
		"ava": "ava",
		"lint": "npm run lint:lib && npm run lint:demo && npm run lint:test",
		"lint:config": "eslint *.js",
		"lint:lib": "eslint src",
		"lint:demo": "eslint demo/src",
		"lint:test": "eslint test",
		"build": "rollup -c",
		"build:production": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup -c",
		"watch": "rollup -c --watch",
		"doc": "rimraf public/docs && esdoc",
		"pretest": "npm run lint && npm run build:production",
		"test": "npm run ava",
		"prepack": "npm test"
	},
	"ava": {
		"failFast": true,
		"files": ["test/**/*.js"]
	},
	"eslintConfig": {
		"extends": "aether"
	},
	"peerDependencies": {
		"dat.gui": ">= 0.0.0 < 1.0.0",
		"synthetic-event": ">= 0.0.0 < 2.0.0",
		"three": ">= 0.89.0 < 0.113.0"
	},
	"devDependencies": {
		"@babel/core": "7.x.x",
		"@babel/preset-env": "7.x.x",
		"@rollup/plugin-node-resolve": "6.x.x",
		"ava": "2.x.x",
		"browser-env": "3.x.x",
		"cross-env": "6.x.x",
		"dat.gui": "0.x.x",
		"esdoc": "1.x.x",
		"esdoc-importpath-plugin": "1.x.x",
		"esdoc-standard-plugin": "1.x.x",
		"eslint": "6.x.x",
		"eslint-config-aether": "1.x.x",
		"math-ds": "1.x.x",
		"rimraf": "3.x.x",
		"rollup": "1.x.x",
		"rollup-plugin-babel": "4.x.x",
		"rollup-plugin-babel-minify": "9.x.x",
		"synthetic-event": "1.x.x",
		"stats.js": "0.x.x",
		"three": "0.112.x"
	}
}
name: package.json
